============

U.S. Expels 60 Russians
-----------------------

America joins **nearly two dozen other nations** in kicking out Russian diplomats.

a…**largest collective expulsion of Russian intelligence officers in history”** _UK Prime Minister_

Flip For Why

card_3.cardText:
Why Now?
--------

*   Response to poisoning of an ex-Russian spy & his daughter (UK citizens) on March 4th.
*   Allies of UK show united front against attack & use of chemical weapon (military grade poison).
*   Concerns about an emboldened Russia attacking on foreign soil.
*   Add into the mix: Russia’s aggression in Ukraine & Syria.

card_4.cardText:
